title: Impls of traits with associated types don't work cross crate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
foo.rs:

``` rust
#![feature(associated_types)]

pub trait T {
    type C;
}
```

main.rs:

``` rust
#![feature(associated_types)]
extern crate foo;

struct Foo;

impl foo::T for Foo {
    type C = ();
}

fn main() {}
```

